471:1: atha khalu anyalokadhātvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmaṣṭau gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasmin samaye tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalādabhyutthitā abhūvan|
471:2: te'ñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato'bhimukhā bhagavantaṃ namasyamānā bhagavantametadūcuḥ-saced bhagavānasmākamanujānīyāt,
471:3: vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau saṃprakāśeyama vācayema lekhayema pūjayema,
471:8: santi kulaputrā iha mamaivāsyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi ekasya bodhisattvasya parivāraḥ|
471:9: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ṣaṣṭyeva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi,
471:10: yeṣāmekaikasya bodhisattvasya iyāneva parivāraḥ ye mama parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti||
471:12: atheyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ samantāt sphuṭitā visphuṭitā abhūt|
471:13: tebhyaśca sphoṭāntarebhyo bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyuttiṣṭhante sma suvarṇavarṇaiḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
471:15: imāmeva sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ niśritya te khalvimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavataḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pṛthivyā adhaṃ samutthitāḥ,
471:17: tādṛśānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ gaṇīnāṃ mahāgaṇīnāṃ gaṇācāryāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukopamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
471:18: ye itaḥ sahāyā lokadhātordharaṇīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajjante sma|
471:35: kaḥ punarvādaḥ pañcāśadbodhisattvaparivārāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām? peyālam|
471:39: na teṣāṃ saṃkhyā vā gaṇanā vā upamā vā upaniṣadvā upalabhyate,
471:40: ya iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau dharaṇīvivarebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samunmajjante sma|
471:41: te ca unmajjyonmajjya yena sa mahāratnastūpo vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaḥ,
471:42: yasmin sa bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ,
471:43: bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sārdhaṃ siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
471:45: upasaṃkramya ca ubhayayostathāgatayorarhatoḥ samyaksaṃbuddhayoḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā sarvāṃśca tān bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmīyān nirmitāṃstathāgatavigrahān ye te samantato daśasu dikṣvanyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu saṃnipatitāḥ,
471:47: tān sarvānabhivandya namaskṛtya ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvastāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān pradakṣiṇīkṛtya nānāprakārairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ|
471:48: añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ca prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhisaṃmukhaṃ namaskurvanti sma||
471:49: tena khalu punaḥ samayena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjatāṃ tathāgatāṃśca vandamānānāṃ nānāprakārairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭuvatāṃ paripūrṇāḥ pañcāśadantarakalpā gacchanti sma|
471:50: tāṃśca pañcāśadantarakalpān sa bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastūṣṇīmabhūt|
471:53: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena tāścatasraḥ parṣadastamevaikaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ saṃjānante sma|
471:54: imāṃ ca sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ śatasahasrākāśaparigṛhītāṃ bodhisattvaparipūrṇāmadrākṣuḥ|
471:55: tasya khalu punarmahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeścatvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
471:61: ime catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhā abhūvan|
471:62: atha khalu catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeragrataḥ sthitvā bhagavato'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ-kaccid bhagavato'lpābādhatā mandaglānatā sukhasaṃsparśavihāratā ca?
471:63: kaccid bhagavan sattvāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ?
471:65: atha khalu te catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantāmābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta-
471:69: mā haiva khedaṃ janayanti lokanāthasya bhāṣataḥ||2||
471:70: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhāṃścaturo bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat-evametat kulaputrāḥ, evametat|
471:72: svākārāśca mamaiva te sattvāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ|
471:73: na ca me khedaṃ janayanti viśodhyamānāḥ|
471:75: mamaiva hyete kulaputrāḥ sattvāḥ paurvakeṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kṛtaparikarmāṇaḥ|
471:78: yatra ye'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratekabuddhabhūmau vā kṛtaparicaryā abhuvan,
471:79: te'pi mayaiva etarhi buddhadharmajñānamavatāritāḥ saṃśrāvitāśca paramārtham||
471:80: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣanta—
471:82: svākārā yena te sattvāḥ suvineyāḥ suśodhakāḥ||3||
471:83: ye cedaṃ jñāna gambhīraṃ śṛṇvanti tava nāyaka|
471:84: śrutvā ca adhimucyante uttaranti ca nāyaka||4||
471:85: evamukte bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhebhyaścaturbhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu kulaputrāḥ,
471:87: tena khalu punaḥ samayena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ cāṣṭānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat-adṛṣṭapūrvo'yamasmābhirmahābodhisattvagaṇo mahābodhisattvarāśiḥ|
471:88: aśrutapūrvaśca yo'yaṃ pṛthivīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā bhagavantaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti bhagavantaṃ ca pratisaṃmodante|
471:89: kutaḥ khalvime bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatā iti?
471:90: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā vicikitsāṃ kathaṃkathāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhigītenaitamevārthaṃ paripṛcchanti sma—
471:93: kuto ime kathaṃ vāpi āgacchanti maharddhikāḥ|
471:106: ato bahutarāścānye yeṣāṃ daśa ca pañca ca||12||
471:109: catvāri trīṇi dve cāpi gaṅgāvālikayā samāḥ|
471:118: koṭī koṭī ca koṭī ca ardhakoṭī tathaiva ca||18||
471:123: viṃśatiddaśa pañcātha catvāri trīṇi dve tathā|
471:125: carantyekātmakā ye ca śāntiṃ vindanti caikakāḥ|
471:126: gaṇanā teṣa naivāsti ye ihādya samāgatāḥ||22||
471:128: śalākāṃ gṛhya hastena paryantaṃ naiva so labhet||23||
471:131: kenaiṣāṃ deśito dharmaḥ kena bodhīya sthāpitāḥ|
471:133: bhittvā hi pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ samantena caturdiśam|
471:142: ime'dya sahasā dṛṣṭā ākhyāhi caritaṃ mune||30||
471:146: kuta enti ime śūrā bodhisattvā viśāradaḥ||32||
471:147: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyebhyo lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo'bhyāgatā bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya nirmitāḥ,
471:148: ye'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
471:149: ye bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu mahāratnasiṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ paryaṅkabaddhāḥ,
471:150: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ ye svakasvakā upasthāyakāḥ,
471:151: te'pi taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ bodhisattvarāśiṃ dṛṣṭvā samantāt pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjantamākāśadhātupratiṣṭhitam,
471:152: te'pyāścaryaprāptāstān svān svāṃstathāgatānetadūcuḥ-kuto bhagavan iyanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ?
471:153: evamuktāste tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstān svān svānupasthāyakānetadūcuḥ-āgamayadhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā muhūrtam|
471:154: eṣa maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ śākyamuneranantaraṃ vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
471:155: sa etaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametamarthaṃ paripṛcchati|
471:156: eṣa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vyākariṣyati|
471:158: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-sādhu sādhu ajita|
471:160: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma-tena hi kulaputrāḥ sarva eva prayatā bhavadhvam|
471:165: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
471:177: jñānaṃ ca me yasya na kāci saṃkhyā||35||
471:181: śṛṇotha me yādṛśakā yathā ca te||36||
471:182: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ maitrayaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi te ajita,
471:184: ya ime ajita bodhisattvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā agaṇanīyāḥ,
471:187: mayaite ajita sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ,
471:189: mayā caite kulaputrā asmin bodhisattvadharme paripācitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā niveśitāḥ parisaṃsthāpitā avatāritāḥ paribodhitāḥ pariśodhitāḥ|
471:190: ete ca ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhastādākāśadhātuparigrahe prativasanti|
471:191: svādhyāyoddeśacintāyoniśomanasikārapravṛttā ete kulaputrā asaṃgaṇikārāmā asaṃsargābhiratā anikṣiptadhurā ārabdhavīryāḥ|
471:195: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
471:224: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
471:225: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni-kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
471:227: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena kumārabhūtena kapilavastunaḥ śākyanagarānniṣkasya gayānagarānnātidūre bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
471:229: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
471:231: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca?
471:232: asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapyanto nopalabhyate|
471:235: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet|
471:237: evaṃ ca vadet-ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti|
471:238: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ-eṣo'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti|
471:239: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam|
471:246: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati-mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
471:248: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti|
471:249: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ-ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti|
471:251: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante|
471:252: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti|
471:253: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti|
471:256: anāgate'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti||
471:257: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
471:262: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū
471:267: bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ|
471:279: eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ|
